patthana2.13:1.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:2.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:3.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca …pe…
patthana2.13:4.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nadassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:4.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.13:5.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:6.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre pañca …pe…
patthana2.13:7.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:8.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:8.1_2: (yāva asaññasattā) uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:9.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:11.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:12.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nadassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:12.1_3: (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbā khandhā.
patthana2.13:13.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbā khandhā.
patthana2.13:14.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ.
patthana2.13:15.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:16.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:17.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:17.1_2: dassanena pahātabbe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:18.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.13:19.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:20.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:20.1_4: vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā nadassanena pahātabbā khandhā, uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā uddhaccasahagato moho, vatthuṁ paccayā uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:21.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:22.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:23.1_0: Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:25.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:26.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.13:27.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve, (sabbattha dve) vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana2.13:29.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:30.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:31.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane dve, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte dve.
patthana2.13:33.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:34.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:35.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—nadassanena pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:36.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe…
patthana2.13:36.1_1: vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:36.1_2: dassanena pahātabbaṁ diṭṭhiṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe…
patthana2.13:36.1_7: dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati.
patthana2.13:37.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā dassanena pahātabbe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe …pe…
patthana2.13:37.1_2: vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena dassanena pahātabbacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, dassanena pahātabbā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:38.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:38.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati;
patthana2.13:38.1_4: nadassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe…
patthana2.13:38.1_8: ariyā nadassanena pahātabbe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese …pe…
patthana2.13:38.1_12: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:39.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:39.1_6: vatthuṁ nadassanena pahātabbe khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe…
patthana2.13:40.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:40.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dassanena pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, diṭṭhiṁ garuṁ katvā …pe….
patthana2.13:41.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:42.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa ca nadassanena pahātabbassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:42.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—dassanena pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:43.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:43.1_5: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana2.13:43.1_8: vatthuṁ nadassanena pahātabbe khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.13:43.1_9: **Sahajātādhipati**—nadassanena pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:44.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:44.1_4: vatthuṁ nadassanena pahātabbe khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:45.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā dassanena pahātabbā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ dassanena pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:46.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:46.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā nadassanena pahātabbā khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:46.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Āvajjanā dassanena pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:48.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:49.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:49.1_2: samāpattiṁ uppādeti dassanena pahātabbaṁ dosaṁ … mohaṁ …
patthana2.13:50.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:50.1_4: paññaṁ, nadassanena pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ … dosaṁ … mohaṁ … mānaṁ …
patthana2.13:51.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:51.1_3: paññaṁ upanissāya diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti, nadassanena pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ … dosaṁ … mohaṁ … mānaṁ …
patthana2.13:52.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:52.1_3: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo …pe…
patthana2.13:52.1_6: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana2.13:52.1_11: vatthu nadassanena pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:53.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:53.1_2: vatthuṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo …pe…
patthana2.13:54.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:55.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (saṅkhittaṁ) …
patthana2.13:56.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:57.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.13:57.1_1: **Sahajātā**—dassanena pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:57.1_2: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—dassanena pahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:58.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa ca nadassanena pahātabbassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:59.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.13:59.1_1: **Sahajātā**—nadassanena pahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:59.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—nadassanena pahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:60.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ …
patthana2.13:61.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.13:62.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.13:63.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:64.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:64.1_1: (Paṭiccasadisaṁ.) Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.13:64.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa ca nadassanena pahātabbassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:65.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:65.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:66.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:66.1_1: **Sahajāto**—dassanena pahātabbo eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.13:67.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:67.1_1: **Sahajātā**—dassanena pahātabbā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:67.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—dassanena pahātabbā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:67.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—dassanena pahātabbā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:68.1_0: Natthipaccayena paccayo, vigatapaccayena paccayo, avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:69.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
patthana2.13:70.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:71.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:72.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa ca nadassanena pahātabbassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:73.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:74.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:75.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:76.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:77.1_0: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta …pe…
patthana2.13:77.1_1: namagge satta, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:78.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare cattāri, nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri (sabbattha cattāri), nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:79.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca (anulomamātikā kātabbā) …pe… avigate satta.
patthana2.13:81.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:84.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:85.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:85.1_1: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:89.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:90.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.13:91.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:91.1_2: uddhaccaṁ ārabbha uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:91.1_3: bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.13:92.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā bhāvanāya pahātabbe pahīne kilese …pe…
patthana2.13:92.1_4: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nabhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe…
patthana2.13:92.1_7: cetopariyañāṇena bhāvanāya pahātabbacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, bhāvanāya pahātabbā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:93.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:93.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nabhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe…
patthana2.13:93.1_11: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nabhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe…
patthana2.13:94.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:94.1_4: vatthuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.13:95.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:95.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.13:96.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:96.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā nabhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:97.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:97.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—bhāvanāya pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:98.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:98.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā nabhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.13:98.1_3: **Sahajātādhipati**—nabhāvanāya pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:99.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:99.1_4: vatthuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.13:100.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:101.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:102.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:103.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:103.1_4: paññaṁ, nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ … dosaṁ … mohaṁ …
patthana2.13:104.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:105.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:105.1_3: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nabhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati;
patthana2.13:105.1_4: nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati …pe…
patthana2.13:105.1_8: vatthu nabhāvanāya pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:106.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:106.1_2: vatthuṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.13:107.1_2: dve, kammapaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:107.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Bhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:107.1_4: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Bhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:108.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.13:108.1_1: **Sahajātā**—nabhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:108.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—nabhāvanāya pahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:109.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
patthana2.13:110.1_0: (Paccanīyavibhaṅgo dassanadukasadiso vibhajitabbo. Evaṁ tīṇi gaṇanāpi gaṇetabbā.)
patthana2.13:112.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:113.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:114.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:115.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:116.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagataṁ mohaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā.
patthana2.13:117.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ mohaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:118.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca mohañca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:119.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:120.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca mohañca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:121.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:122.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:123.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā moho ca …pe…
patthana2.13:124.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:125.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—vicikicchāsahagataṁ mohaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā.
patthana2.13:126.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca mohañca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:127.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cha, purejāte cha, āsevane cha, kamme nava, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte cha, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cha, vigate cha, avigate nava.
patthana2.13:128.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:129.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā ahetukaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:129.1_1: (yāva asaññasattā) uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:130.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:131.1_2: navippayutte cattāri, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:132.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… magge dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana2.13:134.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:135.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:135.1_3: (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā.
patthana2.13:136.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagataṁ mohaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā.
patthana2.13:137.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, vicikicchāsahagataṁ mohaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:138.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:138.1_2: vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:139.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:140.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:140.1_2: dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca mohañca paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:141.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:142.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:142.1_4: vatthuṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā, vatthuṁ paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:142.1_5: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagataṁ mohaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā.
patthana2.13:142.1_6: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca.
patthana2.13:143.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:143.1_2: vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca mohañca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:144.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:145.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā moho ca …pe…
patthana2.13:146.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.13:147.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:148.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:148.1_2: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā nadassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā, uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:149.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:150.1_0: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:152.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:153.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:154.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagataṁ mohaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā.
patthana2.13:155.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca mohañca saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:156.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:157.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:158.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana2.13:159.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana2.13:160.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve, anantare cha (sabbattha cha), vipāke ekaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:162.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:163.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:164.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte cha, naāsevane cha, nakamme cattāri, navipāke cha, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte cha.
patthana2.13:166.1_0: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā cattāri, napurejāte cattāri …pe… navippayutte cattāri.
patthana2.13:167.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana2.13:169.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:169.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Dassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:169.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Dassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:170.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—nadassanena pahātabbahetukā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo, vicikicchāsahagato moho cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:170.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Vicikicchāsahagato moho sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:170.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Vicikicchāsahagato moho sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:171.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:171.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:171.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:172.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:172.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe…
patthana2.13:172.1_5: ariyā nadassanena pahātabbahetuke pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese …pe…
patthana2.13:172.1_7: vatthuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mohañca aniccato …pe…
patthana2.13:172.1_8: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati …pe…
patthana2.13:172.1_9: anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya, mohassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:173.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:173.1_3: vatthuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mohañca assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe…
patthana2.13:174.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cakkhuṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:174.1_1: vatthuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:175.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:175.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:175.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:176.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:176.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe garuṁ katvā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:177.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:178.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:178.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—dassanena pahātabbahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:179.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:179.1_3: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe…
patthana2.13:179.1_5: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana2.13:179.1_8: vatthuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.13:179.1_9: **Sahajātādhipati**—nadassanena pahātabbahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:180.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:180.1_6: vatthuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetuke khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:181.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:181.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa vicikicchāsahagatassa mohassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:181.1_2: dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:181.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ vicikicchāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:182.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimo purimo vicikicchāsahagato moho pacchimassa pacchimassa vicikicchāsahagatassa mohassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:182.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimo purimo vicikicchāsahagato moho pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ vicikicchāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:182.1_4: āvajjanā dassanena pahātabbahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:182.1_5: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimo purimo vicikicchāsahagato moho pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ vicikicchāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:182.1_6: āvajjanā vicikicchāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:183.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ vicikicchāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:183.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca pacchimassa pacchimassa vicikicchāsahagatassa mohassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:183.1_2: vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:183.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ vicikicchāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:185.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:185.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā dassanena pahātabbahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:185.1_2: (Avasesesu dvīsu anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo.) (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā nadassanena pahātabbahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:185.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Dassanena pahātabbahetukā khandhā vicikicchāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:186.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:186.1_4: nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ rāgaṁ … dosaṁ … mohaṁ … mānaṁ …
patthana2.13:187.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:187.1_3: nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ rāgaṁ … dosaṁ … mohaṁ … mānaṁ …
patthana2.13:188.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:188.1_2: paññā, nadassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo … doso … moho … māno …
patthana2.13:188.1_5: senāsanaṁ, vicikicchāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:189.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:189.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca dassanena pahātabbahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:189.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:189.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca vicikicchāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:190.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:190.1_3: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:191.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:191.1_2: vatthuṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe…
patthana2.13:192.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:192.1_2: vatthuṁ ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:193.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:193.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:193.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (saṅkhittaṁ) …
patthana2.13:194.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:194.1_2: **Sahajātā**—dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:194.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:194.1_4: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:195.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.13:195.1_1: **Sahajātā**—nadassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:195.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—nadassanena pahātabbahetukā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:197.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:198.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:198.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:198.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:199.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:199.1_1: **Sahajāto**—dassanena pahātabbahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.13:199.1_3: vicikicchāsahagato eko khandho ca moho ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.13:200.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:201.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:202.1_0: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:203.1_0: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.13:204.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:204.1_3: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:204.1_8: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:205.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:205.1_8: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:205.1_12: Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:206.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:206.1_3: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:206.1_7: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:207.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.13:208.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā cha, naanantare cha, nasamanantare cha, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cha …pe…
patthana2.13:208.1_1: nasampayutte dve, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
patthana2.13:209.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca (anulomamātikā) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.13:211.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:212.1_0: (Evaṁ paṭiccavāropi sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi dassanena pahātabbahetukadukasadisā.
patthana2.13:213.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … cha …pe….
patthana2.13:214.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:215.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:215.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe…
patthana2.13:215.1_4: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe…
patthana2.13:215.1_11: vatthuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mohañca aniccato …pe…
patthana2.13:215.1_12: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe…
patthana2.13:215.1_16: anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya, mohassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:216.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:216.1_4: vatthuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mohañca assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:217.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—cakkhuṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:217.1_1: vatthuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:218.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:218.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ rāgaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.13:219.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:219.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ rāgaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:220.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:220.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:221.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:221.1_3: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, pubbe …pe…
patthana2.13:221.1_8: vatthuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:221.1_9: Sahajātādhipati— nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:222.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:222.1_3: vatthuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati.
patthana2.13:223.1_0: (Anantarapaccaye nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukakāraṇā vicikicchāsahagato moho na kātabbo, uddhaccasahagato moho kātabbo.) Samanantarapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:224.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:224.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:224.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:224.1_3: sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgo parabhaṇḍe chandarāgassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:224.1_4: sakapariggahe chandarāgo parapariggahe chandarāgassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:224.1_5: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā khandhā uddhaccasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:225.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:226.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:227.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:227.1_3: senāsanaṁ uddhaccasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:228.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi …
patthana2.13:229.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa …pe….
patthana2.13:230.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa …pe….
patthana2.13:232.1_0: Savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—savitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:232.1_3: Savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—savitakke khandhe paṭicca vitakko cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.13:232.1_5: Savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—savitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā vitakko ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:233.1_0: Avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—avitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:233.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:233.1_5: vitakkaṁ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, vitakkaṁ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca vitakko, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.13:234.1_0: Avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vitakkaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.13:234.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vitakkaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca savitakkā khandhā.
patthana2.13:235.1_0: Avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vitakkaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, vitakkaṁ paṭicca savitakkā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.13:235.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vitakkaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vitakkaṁ paṭicca savitakkā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca savitakkā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca vitakko sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.13:236.1_0: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—savitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vitakkañca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:236.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vitakkañca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:236.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:237.1_0: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;

patthana2.13:240.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.13:242.1_1: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca ahetukā savitakkā khandhā, vitakkaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:243.1_0: Avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā.

patthana2.13:244.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vitakkañca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana2.13:244.1_7: (Avasesā dve pañhā hetupaccayasadisā ninnānā, ahetukanti niyāmetabbaṁ.)

patthana2.13:250.1_0: Avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—avitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:250.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:250.1_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vitakkaṁ paccayā kaṭattārūpaṁ, khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṁ paccayā khandhā, vitakkaṁ paccayā vatthu, vatthuṁ paccayā vitakko, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā …pe…
patthana2.13:250.1_6: vatthuṁ paccayā avitakkā khandhā, vatthuṁ paccayā vitakko.
patthana2.13:251.1_0: Avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vitakkaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā, vatthuṁ paccayā savitakkā khandhā.
patthana2.13:252.1_0: Avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vitakkaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, vitakkaṁ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā savitakkā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā vitakko sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.13:253.1_0: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṁ paccayā savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—savitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vitakkañca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:253.1_2: savitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:254.1_0: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṁ paccayā avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, savitakke khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vitakko;
patthana2.13:255.1_0: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṁ paccayā savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—savitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vitakkañca paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…

patthana2.13:256.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
