patthana2.13:258.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi …pe…
patthana2.13:258.1_1: naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:260.1_0: Savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— savitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:260.1_3: Savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—savitakke khandhe saṁsaṭṭho vitakko;
patthana2.13:260.1_5: Savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—savitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā vitakko ca …pe…
patthana2.13:261.1_0: Avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—avitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:261.1_3: Avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vitakkaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana2.13:262.1_0: Savitakkañca avitakkañca dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—savitakkaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vitakkañca saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:263.1_0: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha (sabbattha cha) avigate cha.
patthana2.13:265.1_0: Savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho savitakko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:265.1_1: (Evaṁ cha pañhā kātabbā anulomasadisā, ahetukāti niyāmetabbā, tīṇiyeva, moho uddharitabbo.)
patthana2.13:266.1_0: Nahetuyā cha, naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte cha, naāsevane cha, nakamme cattāri, navipāke cha, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge cha, navippayutte cha.
patthana2.13:268.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:269.1_0: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—savitakkā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:269.1_2: Savitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—savitakkā hetū vitakkassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:269.1_4: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Savitakkā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:270.1_0: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—avitakkā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:271.1_0: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—savitakke khandhe ārabbha savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:271.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Savitakke khandhe ārabbha avitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:271.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Savitakke khandhe ārabbha savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:272.1_0: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā avitakkā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā avitakkaṁ jhānaṁ paccavekkhanti, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ avitakkassa maggassa, phalassa, vitakkassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:272.1_2: vatthuṁ avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca aniccato …pe…
patthana2.13:272.1_3: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha vitakko uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena avitakkacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:272.1_7: avitakkā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, vitakkassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:272.1_8: avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca ārabbha avitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:273.1_0: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā avitakkā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā …pe…
patthana2.13:273.1_2: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, savitakkassa maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:273.1_4: vatthuṁ avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca aniccato …pe…
patthana2.13:273.1_5: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana2.13:273.1_7: avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca ārabbha savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:274.1_0: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā avitakkā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā …pe…
patthana2.13:274.1_2: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, savitakkassa maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya, vitakkassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:274.1_4: vatthuṁ avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca aniccato …pe…
patthana2.13:274.1_5: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti, avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca ārabbha savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:275.1_0: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca ārabbha savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:275.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca ārabbha avitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:275.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca ārabbha savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:276.1_0: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:276.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—savitakke khandhe garuṁ katvā savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:277.1_0: Savitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:277.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—savitakkādhipati vitakkassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:278.1_0: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:278.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—savitakke khandhe garuṁ katvā savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:278.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—savitakkādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:279.1_0: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:279.1_3: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ avitakkassa maggassa, phalassa, vitakkassa ca adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:279.1_5: vatthuṁ avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā vitakko uppajjati.
patthana2.13:279.1_6: **Sahajātādhipati**—avitakkādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:280.1_0: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:280.1_3: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, savitakkassa maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:280.1_5: vatthuṁ avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṁ katvā savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:281.1_0: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:281.1_3: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, savitakkassa maggassa, phalassa, vitakkassa ca adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:281.1_5: vatthuṁ avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.13:281.1_6: avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṁ katvā savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:282.1_0: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā savitakkassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:282.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṁ katvā savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:282.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṁ katvā vitakko uppajjati.
patthana2.13:282.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Savitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṁ katvā savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:283.1_0: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā savitakkā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:284.1_0: Savitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā savitakkā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa vitakkassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:284.1_1: savitakkaṁ cuticittaṁ avitakkassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:284.1_3: savitakkā khandhā avitakkassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:284.1_4: dutiyassa jhānassa parikammaṁ dutiyassa jhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:285.1_0: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā savitakkā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:286.1_0: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimo purimo vitakko pacchimassa pacchimassa vitakkassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:286.1_1: purimā purimā avitakkā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ avitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:286.1_4: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ avitakkāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:287.1_0: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimo purimo vitakko pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:287.1_1: avitakkaṁ cuticittaṁ savitakkassa upapatticittassa, avitakkaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ āvajjanāya, avitakkā khandhā savitakkassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:288.1_0: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimo purimo vitakko pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:289.1_0: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā savitakkassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:290.1_0: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā avitakkassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca pacchimassa pacchimassa vitakkassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:290.1_1: savitakkaṁ cuticittañca vitakko ca avitakkassa upapatticittassa …pe…
patthana2.13:290.1_2: āvajjanā ca vitakko ca pañcannaṁ viññāṇānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:290.1_3: savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca avitakkassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:290.1_6: anulomañca vitakko ca avitakkāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:291.1_0: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:293.1_0: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:293.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Savitakkā khandhā avitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:293.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Savitakkā khandhā savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:294.1_0: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:294.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—avitakkaṁ saddhaṁ upanissāya avitakkaṁ jhānaṁ uppādeti, maggaṁ uppādeti, abhiññaṁ uppādeti, samāpattiṁ uppādeti;
patthana2.13:294.1_6: senāsanaṁ vitakkaṁ upanissāya avitakkaṁ jhānaṁ uppādeti, maggaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:295.1_0: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo (tīṇipi upanissayā sabbattha kātabbā).
patthana2.13:295.1_1: Avitakkaṁ saddhaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti;
patthana2.13:295.1_4: samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.13:295.1_13: patthanāya savitakkassa maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:296.1_0: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—avitakkaṁ saddhaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe…
patthana2.13:296.1_1: (dutiyavāre likhitapadā sabbe kātabbā) samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.13:296.1_11: patthanāya savitakkassa maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā vitakkassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:297.1_0: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā savitakkassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:297.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca avitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:297.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:298.1_0: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:298.1_3: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha vitakko uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati …pe…
patthana2.13:298.1_7: vatthu avitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:299.1_0: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:299.1_3: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:300.1_0: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:300.1_3: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:300.1_4: **Vatthupurejātaṁ**—vatthu savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:301.1_0: Savitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (tīṇi, pacchājātā) …
patthana2.13:302.1_0: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.13:302.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—savitakkā cetanā vipākānaṁ savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:304.1_0: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.13:305.1_0: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.13:305.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:305.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:305.1_3: **Sahajātaṁ**—paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu vitakkassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:306.1_0: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā avitakkassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.13:307.1_0: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:307.1_1: (Ekaṁ, paṭiccasadisaṁ.) Savitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.13:307.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:308.1_0: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:308.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:308.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:308.1_3: **Sahajāto**—vitakko sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:308.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vitakko sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu vitakkassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:308.1_7: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha vitakko ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti, vatthu vitakkassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:309.1_0: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā savitakkassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:309.1_1: **Sahajāto**—savitakko eko khandho ca vitakko ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.13:309.1_3: **Sahajāto**—savitakko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.13:310.1_0: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā avitakkassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:310.1_1: **Sahajātā**—savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:310.1_2: **Sahajātā**—savitakkā khandhā ca vatthu ca vitakkassa atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇe, tīṇi).
patthana2.13:310.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:310.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:310.1_5: **Pacchājātā**—savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:311.1_0: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:311.1_1: **Sahajāto**—savitakko eko khandho ca vitakko ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.13:311.1_3: **Sahajāto**—savitakko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.13:312.1_0: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:313.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke nava, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.13:315.1_0: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:315.1_4: Savitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:315.1_9: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:316.1_0: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:316.1_8: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:316.1_12: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:317.1_0: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:317.1_3: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā avitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:317.1_7: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:318.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.13:319.1_1: nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri …pe…
patthana2.13:319.1_2: nasampayutte dve, navippayutte cattāri, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:320.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomamātikā vitthāretabbā) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.13:322.1_0: Savicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—savicāraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:324.1_0: Sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sappītikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:324.1_3: Sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sappītike khandhe paṭicca pīti ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.13:324.1_5: Sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—sappītikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā pīti ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:325.1_0: Appītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—appītikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:325.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe appītikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.13:325.1_4: pītiṁ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, pītiṁ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca pīti, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.13:325.1_5: (Yathā savitakkadukaṁ sabbattha, evaṁ sappītikadukaṁ kātabbaṁ, sabbattha pavattipaṭisandhi navapi pañhā.)
patthana2.13:326.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe…
patthana2.13:327.1_0: Sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ sappītikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:327.1_2: Sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke sappītike khandhe paṭicca pīti ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:327.1_3: Sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ sappītikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā pīti ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:328.1_0: Appītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ appītikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:328.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe appītikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:328.1_4: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:328.1_5: (yāva asaññasattāpi) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:328.1_6: Appītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ pītiṁ paṭicca sappītikā khandhā.
patthana2.13:328.1_7: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Pītiṁ paṭicca sappītikā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:329.1_0: Sappītikañca appītikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sappītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ sappītikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca pītiñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:329.1_2: Sappītikañca appītikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca appītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke sappītike khandhe ca pītiñca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, ahetuke sappītike khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:329.1_3: Sappītikañca appītikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ sappītikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca pītiñca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:329.1_5: ahetukaṁ sappītikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca pītiñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:329.1_7: ahetuke sappītike khandhe ca pītiñca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:330.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi …pe…
patthana2.13:330.1_1: naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:331.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:332.1_0: Sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:333.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.13:335.1_0: Sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sappītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.13:336.1_0: Appītikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā appītiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.13:336.1_1: (Pavattipaṭisandhi kātabbā paṭiccavārasadisā, yāva asaññasattā.) Cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:336.1_2: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā appītikā khandhā pīti ca, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:336.1_3: (Anulomasadisā nava pañhā, pavattiyeva paṭisandhi natthi, ekoyeva moho.)
patthana2.13:337.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi …pe…
patthana2.13:337.1_1: naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme nava, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:339.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:340.1_0: Sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana2.13:340.1_1: hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha (sabbattha cha), avigate cha.
patthana2.13:342.1_0: Nahetuyā cha, naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte cha, naāsevane cha, nakamme cattāri, navipāke cha, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge cha, navippayutte cha.
patthana2.13:344.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:345.1_0: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sappītikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:345.1_2: Sappītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sappītikā hetū pītiyā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:345.1_4: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Sappītikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ pītiyā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:346.1_0: Appītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—appītikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:347.1_0: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—sappītike khandhe ārabbha sappītikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:347.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Sappītike khandhe ārabbha appītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:347.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Sappītike khandhe ārabbha sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:348.1_0: Appītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—appītikena cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:348.1_1: uposathakammaṁ katvā appītikena cittena paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha appītiko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, domanassaṁ uppajjati;
patthana2.13:348.1_4: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā appītikena cittena phalaṁ paccavekkhati, ariyā appītikena cittena nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ appītikassa gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya pītiyā ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:348.1_5: ariyā appītikena cittena appītike pahīne kilese …pe…
patthana2.13:348.1_9: vatthuṁ appītike khandhe ca pītiñca appītikena cittena aniccato …pe…
patthana2.13:348.1_10: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha appītiko rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana2.13:348.1_14: appītikā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya pītiyā ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:348.1_15: appītike khandhe ca pītiñca ārabbha appītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:349.1_0: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—appītikena cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:349.1_2: sappītikena cittena paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha sappītiko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.13:349.1_5: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā sappītikena cittena phalaṁ paccavekkhati, ariyā sappītikena cittena nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ sappītikassa gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:349.1_6: ariyā sappītikena cittena appītike pahīne kilese …pe…

patthana2.13:349.1_12: appītike khandhe ca pītiñca ārabbha sappītikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:350.1_0: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—appītikena cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:350.1_2: sappītikena cittena paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti, appītikā jhānā …pe…
patthana2.13:350.1_4: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā sappītikena cittena phalaṁ paccavekkhati, ariyā sappītikena cittena nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ sappītikassa gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, pītiyā ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:350.1_5: ariyā sappītikena cittena appītike pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese …pe…
patthana2.13:350.1_8: vatthuṁ appītike khandhe ca pītiñca sappītikena cittena aniccato …pe…
patthana2.13:350.1_9: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti, appītike khandhe ca pītiñca ārabbha sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:351.1_0: Sappītiko ca appītiko ca dhammā sappītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—sappītike khandhe ca pītiñca ārabbha sappītikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:351.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Sappītike khandhe ca pītiñca ārabbha appītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:352.1_0: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Sappītike khandhe ca pītiñca ārabbha sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:353.1_0: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:353.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—sappītike khandhe garuṁ katvā sappītikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:354.1_0: Sappītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:354.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—sappītike khandhe garuṁ katvā appītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:354.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—sappītikādhipati pītiyā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:355.1_0: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:355.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—sappītike khandhe garuṁ katvā sappītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:355.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—sappītikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ pītiyā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:356.1_0: Appītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:356.1_4: appītikena cittena taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā appītiko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.13:356.1_7: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā appītikena cittena phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati;
patthana2.13:356.1_8: ariyā appītikena cittena nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ appītikassa gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:356.1_10: vatthuṁ appītike khandhe ca pītiñca appītikena cittena garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā appītiko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, appītike khandhe ca pītiñca garuṁ katvā appītikā khandhā ca pīti ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:356.1_11: **Sahajātādhipati**—appītikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:357.1_0: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:357.1_4: (saṅkhittaṁ) nibbānaṁ sappītikassa gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:357.1_6: vatthuṁ appītike khandhe ca pītiñca sappītikena cittena garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā sappītiko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.13:357.1_7: appītike khandhe ca pītiñca garuṁ katvā sappītikā khandhā uppajjanti.

patthana2.13:360.1_0: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā sappītikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ sappītikānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:360.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā sappītikā khandhā pacchimāya pacchimāya pītiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo—sappītikaṁ cuticittaṁ appītikassa upapatticittassa, sappītikaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ āvajjanāya, sappītikā khandhā appītikassa vuṭṭhānassa, pītisahagatā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā, sappītikaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ appītikassa bhavaṅgassa, sappītikaṁ kusalākusalaṁ appītikassa vuṭṭhānassa, kiriyaṁ vuṭṭhānassa, phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:361.1_1: purimā purimā appītikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ appītikānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;

patthana2.13:361.1_5: appītikaṁ cuticittaṁ sappītikassa upapatticittassa, āvajjanā sappītikānaṁ khandhānaṁ, appītikā khandhā sappītikassa vuṭṭhānassa, vipākamanodhātu sappītikāya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā, appītikaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ sappītikassa bhavaṅgassa, appītikaṁ kusalākusalaṁ sappītikassa vuṭṭhānassa, kiriyaṁ vuṭṭhānassa, phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;

patthana2.13:374.1_3: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha pīti ca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.13:374.1_4: **Vatthupurejātaṁ**—vatthu sappītikānaṁ khandhānaṁ pītiyā ca purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:375.1_0: Sappītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi …
patthana2.13:376.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cha, vipāke nava, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne nava, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.13:378.1_0: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:378.1_4: Sappītiko dhammo appītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:378.1_9: Sappītiko dhammo sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …

patthana2.13:379.1_8: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:379.1_12: Appītiko dhammo sappītikassa ca appītikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
