patthana2.13:672.1_0: Aniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— aniyyānikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:672.1_2: (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṁ paccayā aniyyānikā khandhā.
patthana2.13:672.1_3: Aniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā niyyānikā khandhā.
patthana2.13:672.1_4: Aniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā niyyāniko ca aniyyāniko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā niyyānikā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.

patthana2.13:673.1_3: Niyyānikañca aniyyānikañca dhammaṁ paccayā niyyāniko ca aniyyāniko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—niyyānikaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana2.13:674.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cattāri, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cattāri, āsevane cattāri, kamme nava, vipāke ekaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:675.1_0: Aniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ aniyyānikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:675.1_3: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā aniyyānikā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.13:678.1_0: Aniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— aniyyānikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā …pe…
patthana2.13:678.1_2: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā aniyyānikā khandhā.
patthana2.13:678.1_3: Aniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā niyyānikādhipati.
patthana2.13:679.1_0: Niyyānikañca aniyyānikañca dhammaṁ paccayā niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—niyyānike khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā niyyānikādhipati.
patthana2.13:680.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare tīṇi …pe…
patthana2.13:680.1_1: naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane ekaṁ, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:681.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:682.1_0: Niyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— niyyānikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:683.1_0: Aniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— aniyyānikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:684.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve (sabbattha dve), vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Anulomaṁ.)
patthana2.13:685.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane ekaṁ, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte dve.
patthana2.13:686.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:687.1_0: Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—niyyānikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:687.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Niyyānikā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:687.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Niyyānikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:688.1_0: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—aniyyānikā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:689.1_0: Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena niyyānikacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, niyyānikā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:690.1_0: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:690.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana2.13:690.1_6: ariyā phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:690.1_13: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena aniyyānikacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa …pe…
patthana2.13:690.1_17: aniyyānikā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:691.1_0: Aniyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—nibbānaṁ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:692.1_0: Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:692.1_2: Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:692.1_3: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.13:692.1_5: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Niyyānikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:693.1_0: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:693.1_3: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe…
patthana2.13:693.1_5: ariyā phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:693.1_7: vatthuṁ aniyyānike khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:693.1_8: **Sahajātādhipati**—aniyyānikādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:693.1_9: Aniyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:694.1_0: Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—maggo phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:695.1_0: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā aniyyānikā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ aniyyānikānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:695.1_5: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:695.1_6: Aniyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:697.1_0: Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:697.1_2: tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:697.1_3: Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:697.1_4: **Pakatūpanissayo**—ariyā maggaṁ upanissāya anuppannaṁ samāpattiṁ uppādenti, uppannaṁ samāpajjanti, saṅkhāre aniccato …pe…
patthana2.13:697.1_6: paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya ṭhānāṭhānakosallassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo, maggo phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:698.1_0: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:698.1_21: Aniyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:698.1_22: **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṁ paṭhamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.13:698.1_23: catutthassa maggassa parikammaṁ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:699.1_0: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:700.1_0: Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—niyyānikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:700.1_1: Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.13:700.1_4: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Niyyānikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:701.1_0: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.13:701.1_1: **Sahajātā**(Saṅkhittaṁ.) **Nānākkhaṇikā**—aniyyānikā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:702.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate satta.
patthana2.13:704.1_0: Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:704.1_2: Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:704.1_6: Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa ca aniyyānikassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:705.1_0: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:705.1_8: Aniyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:706.1_0: Niyyāniko ca aniyyāniko ca dhammā niyyānikassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:706.1_1: Niyyāniko ca aniyyāniko ca dhammā aniyyānikassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:707.1_0: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta …pe…
patthana2.13:707.1_1: nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:708.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri …pe…
patthana2.13:708.1_1: nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:709.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca (anulomamātikā vitthāretabbā) …pe… avigate satta.
patthana2.13:711.1_0: Niyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca niyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—niyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:711.1_2: Niyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—niyate khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:712.1_0: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … cattāri.
patthana2.13:713.1_0: Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, niyate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe …pe…
patthana2.13:713.1_2: vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena niyatacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, niyatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:714.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:714.1_3: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha aniyato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe…
patthana2.13:714.1_6: aniyataṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, ariyā phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:714.1_7: ariyā aniyate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese …pe…
patthana2.13:714.1_11: vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha aniyato rāgo …pe…
patthana2.13:714.1_12: domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati …pe…
patthana2.13:714.1_14: Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:714.1_20: yaṁ vatthuṁ āmasantassa micchattaniyatā khandhā uppajjanti, taṁ vatthu micchattaniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:715.1_0: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:715.1_2: Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:715.1_3: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.13:715.1_5: Niyato dhammo niyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:715.1_6: **Sahajātādhipati**—niyatādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:716.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:716.1_2: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā aniyato rāgo uppajjati …
patthana2.13:716.1_6: ariyā phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:716.1_8: vatthuṁ aniyate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā aniyato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.13:716.1_9: **Sahajātādhipati**—aniyatādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:716.1_10: Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:717.1_0: Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—maggo phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, niyatā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:718.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā aniyatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ aniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:718.1_5: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:718.1_6: Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—aniyataṁ domanassaṁ niyatassa domanassassa, aniyatā micchādiṭṭhi niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:720.1_0: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:720.1_7: tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:720.1_8: Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:720.1_10: saṅghaṁ bhinditvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti, ariyā maggaṁ upanissāya anuppannaṁ samāpattiṁ uppādenti, uppannaṁ samāpajjanti …pe…
patthana2.13:721.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:722.1_0: Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:722.1_11: catutthassa maggassa parikammaṁ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:723.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:723.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:724.1_0: Pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … dve … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana2.13:725.1_0: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—niyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:725.1_1: Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.

patthana2.13:726.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana2.13:731.1_0: Niyato ca aniyato ca dhammā niyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:731.1_1: Niyato ca aniyato ca dhammā aniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:732.1_0: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta …pe…
patthana2.13:732.1_1: nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:733.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri …pe…
patthana2.13:733.1_1: nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:734.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca (anulomamātikā vitthāretabbā) …pe… avigate satta.
patthana2.13:736.1_0: Sauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sauttaraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:738.1_0: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saraṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:739.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana2.13:741.1_0: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:742.1_0: Araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ araṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:743.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:745.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:746.1_0: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saraṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.13:747.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.13:749.1_0: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:750.1_0: Araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā araṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ araṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:750.1_4: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā khandhā.
patthana2.13:750.1_5: Araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:751.1_0: Saraṇañca araṇañca dhammaṁ paccayā saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:752.1_0: Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:754.1_0: (Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo, saṁsaṭṭhavārepi dve pañhā kātabbā sabbattha.)
patthana2.13:755.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve (sabbattha dve), vipāke ekaṁ, avigate dve. (Anulomaṁ.)
patthana2.13:756.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane dve, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte dve.
patthana2.13:758.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Arūpadukasadisaṁ, cattāri.)
patthana2.13:759.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe…
patthana2.13:759.1_3: domanassaṁ uppajjati, diṭṭhiṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana2.13:759.1_9: Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā pahīne kilese …pe…
patthana2.13:759.1_14: Saraṇā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:760.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:760.1_5: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:760.1_7: nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:760.1_12: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:760.1_14: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana2.13:760.1_18: vatthuṁ, araṇe khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana2.13:761.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:761.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—rāgaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati …
patthana2.13:761.1_5: Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:761.1_7: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:761.1_8: **Sahajātādhipati**—saraṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:762.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:762.1_3: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe …pe…
patthana2.13:762.1_5: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:762.1_6: nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:762.1_7: **Sahajātādhipati**—araṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:762.1_8: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:762.1_11: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati …
patthana2.13:762.1_16: vatthuṁ, araṇe khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati …
patthana2.13:763.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā saraṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ saraṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:763.1_1: Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—saraṇā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:764.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā araṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ araṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:764.1_3: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—āvajjanā saraṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:766.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:766.1_8: Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:767.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:768.1_0: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.13:769.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:769.1_4: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana2.13:769.1_9: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:769.1_11: vatthuṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana2.13:770.1_0: Pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … dve … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana2.13:771.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—saraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:771.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—saraṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:771.1_4: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Saraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:772.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.13:774.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:774.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.13:774.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:775.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:775.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:775.1_3: vatthuṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana2.13:775.1_4: domanassaṁ uppajjati, vatthu saraṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:776.1_0: Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā saraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:776.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā araṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:776.1_2: **Sahajātā**—saraṇā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:776.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—saraṇā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:776.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—saraṇā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:777.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
patthana2.13:778.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:778.1_3: Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:778.1_8: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:779.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:779.1_8: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:780.1_0: Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā saraṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.13:780.1_1: Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā araṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:781.1_0: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta …pe…
patthana2.13:781.1_1: nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:782.1_1: nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri …pe…
patthana2.13:782.1_2: nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:783.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri (anulomamātikā gahetabbā) …pe…
